name: Onyeka Okongwu
comment: Mar 24: Okongwu (toe) will be inactive Monday against Boston, Brad Rowland of the Locked On Podcast Network reports.

name: AJ Griffin
comment: Mar 21: The Hawks announced Thursday that Bufkin has been diagnosed with a right ankle sprain and will be re-evaluated in 7-10 days.

name: Kobe Bufkin
comment: Mar 21: The Hawks announced Thursday that Bufkin (toe) is making progress in his re-habilitation and will be re-evaluated in 7-10 days.

name: Jalen Johnson
comment: Mar 21: The Hawks announced Thursday that Johnson has been diagnosed with a right ankle sprain and will be re-evaluated in one week, Brad Rowland of the Locked On Podcast Network reports.

name: Seth Lundy
comment: Mar 18: Lundy (back) was inactive Sunday in the G League College Park Skyhawks' 96-91 loss to the Sioux Falls Skyforce due to a back injury.

name: Mouhamed Gueye
comment: Mar 15: Gueye suffered a UCL sprain in his right elbow during Tuesday's G League game against the Indiana Mad Ants and will be re-evaluated in 7-10 days. The Hawks also recalled Gueye from the College Park Sky Hawks on Friday.

name: Saddiq Bey
comment: Mar 11: Bey suffered a torn left ACL and is out for the remainder of the season, ESPN's Adrian Wojnarowski reports.

name: Trae Young
comment: Feb 25: Young (finger) has a torn radial collateral ligament in the fifth finger of his left hand. He will undergo surgery Tuesday and be re-evaluated in four weeks.

name: Xavier Tillman
comment: Mar 24: Tillman is questionable Monday against Atlanta due to left knee swelling, Justin Turpin of WEEI.com reports.

name: Derrick White
comment: Mar 24: White is questionable for Monday's game against the Hawks due to a right hand sprain, Justin Turpin of WEEI.com reports.

name: Jrue Holiday
comment: Mar 24: Holiday (shoulder) is inactive for Monday's game against Atlanta, Justin Turpin of WEEI.com reports.

name: Dennis Smith Jr.
comment: Mar 24: Smith has been ruled out for Monday's game against Toronto due to right hip synovitis, Brian Lewis of the New York Post reports.

name: Keita Bates-Diop
comment: Mar 24: Bates-Diop has been ruled out for Monday's game against the Raptors due to a right shin stress reaction, Meghan Triplett of YES Network reports.

name: Cameron Johnson
comment: Mar 24: Johnson has been ruled out for Monday's game against the Raptors due to a left big toe sprain, Brian Lewis of the New York Post reports.

name: Keon Johnson
comment: Mar 21: Johnson is available for Wednesday's game against the Bucks, NBA freelance journalist Billy Reinhardt reports.

name: Ben Simmons
comment: Mar 14: Simmons underwent a successful microscopic partial discectomy Thursday and is expected to make a full recovery for training camp next season, Michael Scotto of USA Today reports.

name: Dariq Whitehead
comment: Jan 29: Whitehead underwent successful season-ending surgery on his left shin stress reaction Monday and is expected to need three months to recover, Evan Barnes of Newsday reports.

name: Coby White
comment: Mar 24: White is listed as probable for Monday's game against Washington due to a right hip strain.

name: Alex Caruso
comment: Mar 24: Caruso is probable for Monday's game against the Wizards due to a left ankle sprain.

name: Dalen Terry
comment: Mar 24: Terry is  probably for Monday's game against Washington due to the right calf contusion.

name: Lonzo Ball
comment: Mar 21: There is optimism that Ball (knee) will be able to play next season, K.C. Johnson of NBC Sports Chicago reports.

name: Julian Phillips
comment: Mar 15: The Bulls announced Friday that Phillips has been diagnosed with a right foot sprain and is out indefinitely.

name: Patrick Williams
comment: Feb 23: The Bulls announced Friday that Williams will undergo surgery to address bone edema in his left foot and will be out for the remainder of 2023-24.

name: Zach LaVine
comment: Feb 8: LaVine underwent season-ending surgery on his right foot Thursday, Will Gottlieb of AllCHGO.com reports.

name: Ty Jerome
comment: Mar 24: Jerome (ankle) remains out for Sunday's game against the Heat and is without a clear return timeline.

name: Max Strus
comment: Mar 23: Strus (knee) won't play in Sunday's game versus the the Heat.

name: Dean Wade
comment: Mar 23: Wade (knee) has been ruled out for Sunday's game against the Heat.

name: Donovan Mitchell
comment: Mar 19: Mitchell will be re-evaluated in one week after undergoing a procedure on his nasal fracture Tuesday, Shams Charania of The Athletic reports.

name: Maxi Kleber
comment: Mar 24: Kleber is questionable for Monday's game against Utah due to right knee soreness, Grant Afseth of SI.com reports.

name: Josh Green
comment: Mar 17: Coach Jason Kidd said Sunday that Green is "likely out a couple of weeks" after suffering a right ankle sprain in Thursday's loss to Oklahoma City, Mavericks radio play-by-play broadcaster Chuck Cooperstein reports.

name: Brandon Williams
comment: Mar 16: Wiliams (wrist) won't play in Sunday's game versus the Thunder.

name: Zeke Nnaji
comment: Mar 24: Nnaji (thigh) has been ruled out for Monday's game against the Grizzlies.

name: Jamal Murray
comment: Mar 24: Murray (ankle) is listed as questionable for Monday's game against the Grizzlies.

name: Nikola Jokic
comment: Mar 24: Jokic (back/hip) is questionable for Monday's game against the Grizzlies.

name: Vlatko Cancar
comment: Aug 17: Cancar underwent surgery surgery on his left knee Thursday and is out indefinitely, Vinny Benedetto of The Denver Gazette reports.

name: Jalen Duren
comment: Mar 24: Duren (back) won't play Sunday against the Pelicans. Johnny Kane of Bally Sports Detroit reports.

name: Cade Cunningham
comment: Mar 24: Cunningham has been ruled out for Sunday's game against the Pelicans due to left knee injury management, Keith Langlois of the Pistons' official site reports.

name: Taj Gibson
comment: Mar 24: Gibson (hamstring) will not play in Sunday's game versus the Pelicans.

name: Quentin Grimes
comment: Mar 23: Grimes (knee) has been ruled out for Sunday's matchup with the Pelicans.

name: Simone Fontecchio
comment: Mar 23: Fontecchio (toe) will not play in Sunday's game versus the Pelicans.

name: Stanley Umude
comment: Mar 22: The Pistons announced Friday that Umude will miss the remainder of the season due to a hairline fracture in his right ankle, Keith Langlois of the Pistons' official site reports.

name: Isaiah Stewart
comment: Mar 20: Stewart (hamstring) has been ruled out for the remainder of the 2023-24 season, Keith Langlois of the Pistons' official site reports.

name: Ausar Thompson
comment: Mar 20: The Pistons announced Wednesday that Thompson will miss the remainder of the season while being treated for a blood clot, Shams Charania of The Athletic reports.

name: Cam Whitmore
comment: Mar 12: Coach Ime Udoka said Tuesday that Whitmore (knee) will miss roughly three weeks, Jonathan Feigen of the Houston Chronicle reports.

name: Alperen Sengun
comment: Mar 12: Shams Charania of The Athletic reported Tuesday that Sengun (ankle) has been diagnosed with a Grade 3 right ankle sprain and will likely miss the remainder of the regular season.

name: Tari Eason
comment: Mar 5: The Rockets announced Tuesday that Eason underwent successful surgery to treat a benign growth in his lower leg, and he's expected to make a full recovery in approximately four months.

name: Steven Adams
comment: Feb 1: Adams (knee) was traded from the Grizzlies to the Rockets in exchange for Victor Oladipo and three second-round picks Thursday, Adrian Wojnarowski of ESPN reports.

name: Isaiah Wong
comment: Mar 22: Wong tallied 24 points (6-13 FG, 5-7 3Pt, 7-11 FT) and three assists over 22 minutes during Sunday's 100-85 Summer League loss to the Pistons.

name: Bennedict Mathurin
comment: Mar 9: Mathurin is slated to undergo season-ending surgery to repair a torn labrum in his right shoulder, Adrian Wojnarowski of ESPN reports.

name: Russell Westbrook
comment: Mar 24: Westbrook has been cleared to return for Monday's game against Indiana after three weeks of recovery following surgery on a fractured left hand, Joey Linn of SI.com reports.

name: P.J. Tucker
comment: Mar 24: Tucker (calf) has been ruled out for Sunday's game against the 76ers, Law Murray of The Athletic reports.

name: Moussa Diabate
comment: Mar 23: Diabate recorded 10 points (4-14 FG, 1-1 FT), 18 rebounds, five assists, three steals and three blocks over 39 minutes in Sunday's 115-111 win over Westchester.

name: Jordan Miller
comment: Mar 23: Miller was absent during Thursday's 110-101 win over Greensboro with an Achilles injury.

name: D'Angelo Russell
comment: Mar 25: Russell is out for Sunday's game against the Pacers due to a non-COVID illness, Dave McMenamin of ESPN.com reports.

name: Jalen Hood-Schifino
comment: Mar 23: Los Angeles recalled Hood-Schifino from the G League's South Bay Lakers on Sunday.

name: Christian Wood
comment: Mar 19: Wood (knee) underwent a successful arthroscopic procedure on his left knee Tuesday, Ryan Ward of LakersNation.com reports.

name: Gabe Vincent
comment: Mar 19: Vincent (knee) is nearing a return to action and intends to play again this season, barring a setback, NBA writer Marc Stein reports.

name: Jarred Vanderbilt
comment: Mar 12: Vanderbilt (foot) is progressing in his rehab, but he has not been cleared for on-court activities as of Tuesday, Khobi Price of The Orange County Register reports.

name: Colin Castleton
comment: Feb 25: Castleton is expected to miss multiple weeks after he recently suffered a fractured right wrist, Dan Woike of the Los Angeles Times reports.

name: Yuta Watanabe
comment: Mar 24: Watanabe (personal) has been ruled out for Sunday's game against the Nuggets.

name: Brandon Clarke
comment: Mar 24: Clarke (Achilles) is doubtful for Monday's game against the Nuggets.

name: Lamar Stevens
comment: Mar 24: Stevens (thigh) is questionable for Monday's game against the Nuggets.

name: John Konchar
comment: Mar 24: Konchar is doubtful for Monday's game against the Nuggets due to right heel soreness.

name: Jake LaRavia
comment: Mar 24: LaRavia is questionable for Monday's game against the Nuggets due to an illness.

name: Luke Kennard
comment: Mar 24: Kennard (personal) has been ruled out for Monday's game against the Nuggets.

name: Vince Williams Jr.
comment: Mar 24: Williams (knee) is doubtful for Monday's game against the Nuggets.

name: Desmond Bane
comment: Mar 24: Bane (back) is questionable for Monday's game against the Nuggets.

name: Derrick Rose
comment: Mar 5: Rose will be re-evaluated in three weeks after being diagnosed with a right osteitis pubis stemming from an injury suffered on Feb. 28 against Minnesota, Damichael Cole of The Memphis Commercial Appeal reports.

name: Ziaire Williams
comment: Mar 5: The Grizzlies announced Tuesday that Williams has been diagnosed with a Grade 2 strain of hip flexor and low back muscles and will be re-evaluated in four weeks.

name: Marcus Smart
comment: Feb 22: The Grizzlies announced Thursday that Smart (finger) will be re-evaluated in three weeks.

name: Ja Morant
comment: Jan 11: Morant underwent successful surgery on his right shoulder Thursday and will be out for the remainder of 2023-24, Chris Haynes of Turner Sports reports.

name: Jaime Jaquez Jr.
comment: Mar 24: Jaquez is out Sunday versus Cleveland due to discomfort in his left knee and ankle, Tim Reynolds of Associated Press reports.

name: Duncan Robinson
comment: Mar 23: Robinson (back) won't play in Sunday's game versus the Cavaliers, Ira Winderman of the South Florida Sun Sentinel reports.

name: Kevin Love
comment: Mar 23: Love (heel) will remain sidelined for Sunday's game versus the Cavaliers, Ira Winderman of the South Florida Sun Sentinel reports.

name: Tyler Herro
comment: Mar 16: Herro (foot) received a platelet-rich plasma injection Friday on his right foot and will re-evaluated in 1-2 weeks, Anthony Chiang of the Miami Herald reports.

name: Josh Richardson
comment: Mar 6: The Heat announced that Richardson underwent successful surgery to repair right shoulder instability Wednesday.

name: AJ Green
comment: Mar 24: Green (illness) has been ruled out for Sunday's game against Oklahoma City, Eric Nehm of The Athletic reports.

name: Jaylen Clark
comment: Mar 19: Clark (Achilles) has been ruled out for Tuesday's game against the Nuggets and remains sidelined indefinitely.

name: Karl-Anthony Towns
comment: Mar 12: The Timberwolves announced Tuesday that Towns underwent successful surgery to repair a left knee lateral meniscus tear and will be re-evaluated in four weeks.

name: Dyson Daniels
comment: Mar 23: Daniels (knee) is out for Sunday's game versus the Pistons.

name: Brandon Ingram
comment: Mar 22: Ingram suffered a bone contusion in his left knee Thursday against the Magic and is expected to miss at least two weeks, Shams Charania of The Athletic reports.

name: Julius Randle
comment: Mar 25: Knicks head coach Tom Thibodeau said Friday that Randle is still waiting to take contact and is "trying to strengthen the shoulder area," Stefan Bondy of the New York Post reports. "Some days have been better than others," Thibodeau added. "But just keep working at it and you never know when it turns. So that's the way we have to approach it."

name: Mitchell Robinson
comment: Mar 24: Robinson (ankle) has been ruled out for Monday's game against the Pistons, Stefan Bondy of the New York Post reports.

name: OG Anunoby
comment: Mar 24: Anunoby (elbow) has been declared out for Monday's game against the Pistons, Stefan Bondy of the New York Post reports.

name: Luguentz Dort
comment: Mar 24: Dort won't return to Sunday's game against the Bucks due to a face/nose contusion, Rylan Stiles of FanSided.com reports.

name: Gary Harris
comment: Mar 24: Harris (foot) won't play in Saturday's game versus the Kings.

name: Caleb Houstan
comment: Mar 24: Houston won't return to Saturday's game against the Kings due to left ankle soreness, Cody Taylor of USA Today reports.

name: Kyle Lowry
comment: Mar 24: Lowry will not play in Sunday's game against the Clippers for rest purposes, Adam Aaronson of PhillyVoice.com reports.

name: Joel Embiid
comment: Mar 20: Embiid (knee) won't be with the 76ers during their upcoming four-game road trip, which starts Wednesday in Phoenix and ends Monday in Sacramento, Shams Charania of The Athletic reports.

name: De'Anthony Melton
comment: Mar 18: Head coach Nick Nurse said Monday that he had no update on the status of Melton, who hasn't played since Feb. 27 due to lumbar spine bone stress, Derek Bodner of AllPHLY.com reports.

name: Robert Covington
comment: Mar 17: Covington (knee) did some on-court work following Sunday's practice and is ramping up for a return to game action, Gina Mizell of The Philadelphia Inquirer reports.

name: Damion Lee
comment: Mar 20: Lee (knee) has been ruled out for Wednesday's game against the 76ers, and there's no timetable for his return.

name: Shaedon Sharpe
comment: Mar 24: Sharpe (abdomen) has been assigned to the team's G League affiliate for conditioning.

name: Deandre Ayton
comment: Mar 24: Ayton (elbow) is questionable for Monday's game against the Rockets.

name: Anfernee Simons
comment: Mar 24: Simons (knee) is questionable for Monday's game against Houston.

name: Matisse Thybulle
comment: Mar 24: Thybulle (ankle) is questionable for Monday's game against the Rockets.

name: Jerami Grant
comment: Mar 24: Grant (hamstring) is doubtful for Monday's game against the Rockets.

name: Malcolm Brogdon
comment: Mar 22: Brogdon (elbow) has been ramping up his activity, Sean Highkin of RoseGardenReport.com reports.

name: Robert Williams III
comment: Nov 13: Williams underwent successful surgery Monday to reconstruct a torn ligament in his right knee after he sustained a patellar dislocation and is expected to make a full recovery ahead of the 2024-25 campaign.

name: Sasha Vezenkov
comment: Mar 24: Vezenkov (ankle) is questionable for Monday's game against the 76ers.

name: Kevin Huerter
comment: Mar 21: The Kings announced Thursday that Huerter, who has been ruled out for Thursday's game against Washington, has been diagnosed with a dislocated shoulder and labral tear and doesn't have a timetable to return, Jason Anderson of The Sacramento Bee reports.

name: Trey Lyles
comment: Mar 15: Lyeles (knee) is expected to be reevaluated in two weeks due to an MCL sprain, Frankie Cartoscelli of KHTK Sactown Sports 1140 reports.

name: Victor Wembanyama
comment: Mar 24: Wembanyama is questionable for Monday's game against the Suns due to a left ankle sprain, Andrew Lopez of ESPN.com reports.

name: Charles Bassey
comment: Dec 12: Bassey will miss the remainder of the season after tearing his left ACL in Sunday's G League contest against the Legends, Jeff McDonald of the San Antonio Express-News reports.

name: D.J. Carton
comment: Mar 24: Carton (ankle) has been ruled out for Sunday's game against the Nets, Blake Murphy of Sportsnet.ca reports.

name: Jontay Porter
comment: Mar 24: Porter (personal) has been ruled out for Monday's game against the Nets, Blake Murphy of Sportsnet.ca reports.

name: Immanuel Quickley
comment: Mar 24: Quickley (personal) won't play Monday against the Nets, Blake Murphy of Sportsnet.ca reports.

name: RJ Barrett
comment: Mar 15: Coach Darko Rajakovic said Barrett, who remains away from the team while mourning the death of his younger brother, doesn't have a return timetable, Eric Koreen of The Athletic reports.

name: Chris Boucher
comment: Mar 11: Boucher has suffered a partial MCL tear in his right knee and will undergo further testing in coming days, Kayla Grey of TSN reports.

name: Jakob Poeltl
comment: Mar 5: The Raptors announced Tuesday that Poeltl underwent surgery to repair a torn ligament in the pinkie of his left hand and is out indefinitely, Josh Lewenberg of TSN.ca reports.

name: Scottie Barnes
comment: Mar 4: Barnes underwent surgery to repair a fracture to the third metacarpal bone on his left hand Monday, Eric Smith of Sportsnet 590 The Fan reports.

name: Jordan Clarkson
comment: Mar 24: Clarkson (groin) is questionable for Monday's game against the Mavericks.

name: Omer Yurtseven
comment: Mar 24: Yurtseven (ankle) is questionable for Monday's game against Dallas.

name: Lauri Markkanen
comment: Mar 24: Markkanen (quadriceps) is questionable for Monday's game against Dallas.

name: Kyle Kuzma
comment: Mar 24: Kuzma is out for Monday's game against the Bulls due to left shoulder soreness.

name: Landry Shamet
comment: Mar 24: Shamet (calf) has been ruled out for Monday's game against the Bulls.

name: Eugene Omoruyi
comment: Mar 24: Omoruyi (ankle) has been ruled out for Monday's game against Chicago.

name: Jordan Poole
comment: Mar 24: Poole is questionable for Monday's game against the Bulls due to a right ankle sprain.

name: Tyus Jones
comment: Mar 24: Jones (back) has been ruled out for Monday's game against the Bulls.

name: Bilal Coulibaly
comment: Mar 18: Coulibaly will miss the remainder of the season due to an ongoing recovery from a right wrist contusion, Ava Wallace of The Washington Post reports.

name: Isaiah Livers
comment: Feb 26: Livers (hip) has been ruled out for the remainder of the regular season.
